alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:16PM CDT until June 03 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Eastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 216 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Van Buren to near Roland to 4 miles west of Arkoma, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Muldrow... Roland... Moffett... Brushy... Figure Five... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Short... Shibley... Mill Creek... Cottonwood... Uniontown... Dora... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 9. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 314 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
